text: The State Flag of Chiapas has a white background with the state coat of arms. ==Historical flags== File:Flag of the Province of Chiapas.svg| Flag of Chiapas (1820–1838) File:Flag of Guatemala (1838-1843).svg| Flag of Soconusco (1838–1842) File:Bandera de Chiapas (1999).png| Flag of Chiapas (1999) ==Related pages== * List of Mexican flags Chiapas Category:Chiapas Chiapas
title: Flag of Chiapas
